languages.text: "Ты поздно начала переживать об этом, шерин". {n}Тоска, затопившая голос Пощады, черна и неизбывна. Она рисует на его лице шрамы, оставленные горем и обидой.{/n}
"It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты поздно начала переживать об этом, шерин". {n}Тоска, затопившая голос Пощады, черна и неизбывна. Она рисует на его лице шрамы, оставленные горем и обидой.{/n}

languages.text: “现在才开始担心这些事情，恐怕已经太晚了，亲爱的。”{n}悯慈的声音中充满了避无可避的阴沉痛苦，与他脸上因悲伤与怨恨留下的伤疤交相呼应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “现在才开始担心这些事情，恐怕已经太晚了，亲爱的。”{n}悯慈的声音中充满了避无可避的阴沉痛苦，与他脸上因悲伤与怨恨留下的伤疤交相呼应。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「今さら心配しても遅いのだ、シャリーン」{n}マーシーの声に滲み出た苦悩は、悲嘆と恨みが顔に残した傷跡をなぞるように、黒く、逃れがたいものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「今さら心配しても遅いのだ、シャリーン」{n}マーシーの声に滲み出た苦悩は、悲嘆と恨みが顔に残した傷跡をなぞるように、黒く、逃れがたいものだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «Es un poco tarde para empezar a preocuparte por eso, shereen». {n}La angustia que llena la voz de Mercy es negra e ineludible y deja recorre las cicatrices del dolor y el resentimiento en su rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es un poco tarde para empezar a preocuparte por eso, shereen». {n}La angustia que llena la voz de Mercy es negra e ineludible y deja recorre las cicatrices del dolor y el resentimiento en su rostro.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « C'est un peu tard pour t'en inquiéter, shereen. » {n}La voix de Mercy est empreinte d'une douleur noire et inéluctable qui trace des marques de chagrin et de rancœur sur son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est un peu tard pour t'en inquiéter, shereen. » {n}La voix de Mercy est empreinte d'une douleur noire et inéluctable qui trace des marques de chagrin et de rancœur sur son visage.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Ein bisschen zu spät, Euch darüber Gedanken zu machen, Shereen." {n}Mercys Schmerz durchdringt schwarz und unausweichlich seine Stimme und lässt Narben von Trauer und Verachtung in seinem Gesicht zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}

traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Bu konuda endişelenmek için çok geç şirinim." {n}Merhamet'in sesine yayılan kapkaranlık ve kaçınılamaz ızdırap, yüzünde keder ve öfkeden izler bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's a bit late to start worrying about that now, shereen." {n}The anguish that has permeated Mercy's voice is black and inescapable, tracing scars left by grief and resentment on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuda endişelenmek için biraz geç artık şirinim." {n}Merhamet'in sesine yayılan kapkaranlık ve kaçınılamaz ızdırap, yüzünde keder ve öfkeden izler bırakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
